attributes.action: Stop all foreign aid and save our NHS
attributes.background: Our NHS is on its Knees whilst hundreds of millions of pounds are sent abroad, doctors and nurses doing there best working ridiculous hours,  sadly it looks like there fighting a loosing battle, our government must act now and not only support them but support the British people.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170532
